runs.comm: swinging into the pads, flicked in front of square
full and straight, Shehzad uses his wrists and secures a single behind square
back of a length and angling away outside off, kicks up a bit. Cut to backward point
straying into the pads, flicked to deep backward square leg
short and wide outside off, Shehzad slaps it to backward point point, straight to the fielder
width outside off, square-cut away.... Whistles away to the boundary
Boult strikes with his first ball! Half-tracker outside off, might have been a slower ball. Hafeez skies it. Santner sprints back from cover, dives, and takes a fine catch
full and angled across, orthodox cover-drive between covers and mid-off
back of a length, dab-and-run single to short cover. Shehzad aims to slide his bat, it gets stuck. He had his foot in, though
rising ball outside off, Rizwan can't get on top of the bounce. Dragged to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, cut away towards backward point. Rizwan takes off, and is then sent back. Santner swoops down on the ball, but does not effect a direct hit
width outside off, cut away strongly behind point. He hits the gap
dug in short on middle, does not rise as much as Shehzad expected. Pulled over backward square leg. Boult goes low and completes the catch even as the ball was dying on him
back of a length and angling away, punched to mid-off

Brain freeze for Rizwan Horrible, horrible running. The one pitched outside leg, hits the pad, as Rizwan misses the attempted leg-side flick. Rizwan goes far down the wicket, for a non-existent single. Santner collects the ball, charges in with it, and takes the bails off
back of a length and angling away, cut and a miss
shortish and outside off, Sarfraz cuts in the air. Munro at backward point dives to his right, gets both hands to it, and can't hang on. He can only tip it away
back of a length and ducks back in, inside-edged onto the pad
short and wide outside off, poor ball. Punched through point for four
back of a length and keeps going away with the angle, late cut past backward point
full and outside off, driven to cover-point
banged in short on middle, pulled over square leg
back of a length and outside off, square-cut away past a diving Munro
shorter and outside off, Malik controls a pull and sends it to the midwicket boundary
full and angling away outside off, Sarfraz crunches it square through point
length and on middle, tucks the batsman up for room. Check pushed to mid-off
full and on middle, tapped in front of midwicket
punched to mid-off

Another cracker of a catch! Full and slants away outside off, Malik looks to swing it across the line. He miscues it off the bottom outside half. McClenaghan tracks back from mid-on, dives, and pouches it
back of a length, punched to cover-point. A fumble gives a single
back of a length, jabbed to point
full and bends into the pads, he falls over the flick and misses it
slanting into the pads again, Umar still can't flick it away. Leg bye
short at 145ks, tucked behind square
short, rising ball, hurries on at 145ks again. Blocked
milked through backward square leg again. This time they get two
short ball on off, Sarfraz rocks back and pulls well to cow corner. The man from deep midwicket dives to his left, parries the ball to the boundary
slower through the air, dabbed in front of cover
swept away to deep square leg
pitched up and outside off, eased down the ground
seam-up ball, hits the pad outside the line of off
hint of turn, nudged to point with soft hands
Sarfraz takes a step out, then goes low for a sweep. He does not connect and is struck on the shoulder
back of a length, dropped defensively in front of cover
short and angled in from round the stumps, glanced to long leg
short ball, tests Sarfraz. He is hurried onto the pull. He gets a top edge, that swirls away from the keeper running to his left. The ball drops into no-man's land behind square on the leg side
slippery short ball outside off, Sarfraz rides it to third man
banged in short on off again, he drags it to the leg side
shorter and outside off, Umar Akmal swings it into the hands of the sub fielder at deep square leg
low full toss, pushed to cover
short, lifts off the surface, and catches Sarfraz in a tangle
short and outside off, ramped away to the third man boundary
slower full ball, dabbed in front of point
slower ball, clipped off the pads behind square
off-stump yorker, dug out
slower ball goes wrong, drifting down leg
low full toss on off, Afridi shovels it to long-on
width outside off, Afridi creates more of it, by backing away and lifting over the covers
full ball, slogged to the leg side with no timing
short and hurries on to beat the pull
Sarfraz flits around the crease and throws the bowler off course. Sprayed miles wide outside off
banged in short, the batsman is late onto the pull. Top-edges it and sends it over the back-tracking Ronchi
dug in, pulled firmly to deep midwicket
lifting ball outside off, swing and a miss
slower, floaty yorker, squirted back to him
Safraz dances down the track and flicks this little roller to deep midwicket
banged in short and quicker wide outside off, left alone. Wide called

Elliott sucks pace off this and gets Afridi. 90ks, slower leg-breakish ball, I suspect that came from the back of the hand. Afridi wound up, but drags it to Henry at long-on. Afridi could not manufacture his own pace
short and outside off, cut to deep cover

Double-strike from Elliott. Short and wide outside off, Wasim perishes for a golden duck. He cuts it in the air off the back foot. Guptill throws himself to his left at backward point and smartly takes it
shorter, dabbed towards backward point
full and outside off, driven to long off
floaty full toss, slow at 97ks, pushed to cover
full on the stumps, hit hard to long-on
off-side wide
width outside off, Sarfraz reaches out and cuts it through point
full toss outside off, this is square-driven four
pushed wide outside off, late cut to backward point
yorker on middle, dug out
Sarfraz dances out, takes it on the full and drags it to long-on
floated and outside off, split-finger slower ball, slapped back over the bowler's head
back of a length on middle, Sarfraz goes low for a sweep. He can only offer a dolly catch to short fine off a top edge. Pakistan are collapsing badly
full and straight, flicked through midwicket
bouncer, ducked under. Elliott shows off his rangle
pitched up on off, patted towards mid-off for a scampered single
short and wide outside off, Anwar backs away and guides it over backward point
Anwar backs away, Milne chases him with a short ball at 148ks. He plays with an angled bat, and gets a thin edge behind to Ronchi
short, 145ks, Amir hops up and fends awkwardly
full and just outside off, orthodox drive to point
short on middle, weak cut to point again
bumpy short ball on the leg stump, fended in front of square leg
Amir steps away, the bowler follows him with a full ball. Driven to mid-off
near yorker-length ball, Amir clears his front leg and drags to long-on
Wahab backs away, this is hurled short at him. Top-edges it over cover
Amir moves away now, and misses a short ball outside leg
full toss on middle from round the stumps, pushed to midwicket

NZ take the series with a thumping 95-run win, the biggest win in T20Is for them in terms of runs .Lifting short ball, Wahab steps away outside leg and sends it in the air off a big top edge. Ronchi settles under it
